definition: to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from

sentences.english: He fled to Brazil trying to escape the long armof the law.
sentences.chinese: 他逃到巴西，企圖逃避恢恢法網。

sentences.english: The inspectors soon saw through his scheme to avoid paying income tax.
sentences.chinese: 稽查員一眼就看穿了他企圖逃避繳納所得的詭計。

sentences.english: Avoid late nights if you can, because you probably can't avoid early morning classes.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以請避免熬夜，因爲你無法逃避早課。

sentences.english: It's natural for the guests to feel anger and despair as they face their ineluctable deaths.
sentences.chinese: 面對無法逃避的死亡，客人們自然會感到憤怒和絕望。

sentences.english: She fled to her parents’ house to escape an abusive marriage.
sentences.chinese: 爲了逃避屈辱的婚姻，她逃到父母家。

sentences.english: Instead of running away from the problem, we are facing reality as it is.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有逃避問題，反之我是如實地正視實相。

sentences.english: I am looking forward to the future , but I have no reasons to shirk my today-duty.
sentences.chinese: 我憧憬未來，但我沒有任何理由逃避今天的責任。

sentences.english: The man fled to the mountains to avoid the conscription.
sentences.chinese: 爲了逃避募兵，那個人躲到山裏去了。

sentences.english: Therefore his love of work is an escape from life.
sentences.chinese: 因此，熱愛工作變成逃避生活。

sentences.english: Those concerns are real - I'm not trying to move away from them.
sentences.chinese: 這種擔心是切實存在的，我並不想逃避。

sentences.english: Mr Chan shirks the responsibility of paying the debts. He secretly left Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 陳先生爲了逃避債務的責任，便悄悄地離開了香港。
逃避到你的無壓力區域。

sentences.english: In our society we are inclined to avoid hiddenness.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的社會中，我們傾向於逃避隱居的生活。

sentences.english: Do you want to run away from unhappiness?
All animals instinctively respond to escape from predators and to preserve their lives.
sentences.chinese: 所有的動物都會本能的逃避捕食者以保護自己的生命。

definition: to hide/to evade/to dodge/to take shelter/to avoid (difficulties)
to use as an excuse/on the pretext/excuse/pretext
to deceive others and to deceive oneself/to believe one's own lies
variant of 迴避|回避[hui2 bi4]
